main event: A witness observed a bright object in the sky over Shade, Ohio on April 5, 1967.
interesting points: The object had a bright flashing light and a sound similar to a soup bowl,The sighting lasted approximately 3-4 minutes before the object disappeared,The witness described the object's color changing from blue-green to red to yellow,The object appeared at a high altitude and was not considered to be an airplane or satellite,The witness had previous experiences involving strange clouds with lights and colors.
sighted object: a bright object in the sky
witness description: The witness reported peculiar experiences with strange clouds and lights in the past.
